name: NAME THAT FRUIT 🍉🍊🍓
description:
NAME THAT FRUIT 🍉🍎🥝

Can you identify the fruit?

Identify Fruits in this wonderful trivia game with beautiful quality images.

Fruits included in NAME THAT FRUIT such as Mango, Pear, Grapes etc....

🔹60 Fruits listed from all over the world.

🔹New levels will always be updated.(Vegetables will be added to the next update)

🔹Learn Fruits from all over the World.

🔹Use hints when you get stuck or unsure of the name of the Fruit.

How to Play NAME THAT FRUIT.

Click on the tile to reveal the Fruit in the pictures. 

The more tiles that you click the less coins you receive. If you reveal the fruit without clicking to many tiles you earn more coins. 

Example: 

Correct answer (4 tiles opened) you earn 5 coins.

Correct answer (7 tiles opened) you earn 4 coins.

Correct answer (9 tiles opened) you earn 3 coins.

Correct answer (10+ tiles opened)  you earn 2 coins.

Privacy Policy: http://pub-be2cw-n5e4w.quickappninja.com/privacy-policy/
